Title: Requires search engines and social media networks to include a consumer notice on limited services pregnancy center listings and posts
Summary: Requires search engines such as Google, Yahoo or Bing to include a notice to users when searching limited services pregnancy center listings that such limited services pregnancy centers provide limited medical and abortion care and may not have medical professionals onsite; requires social media networks such as Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Tumblr and Flickr to include such consumer notice on any posts or advertisements by such centers.
LawCode: Add ยง394-cccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring search engines and social media networks to include a consumer notice on limited services pregnancy center listings and posts
